description:
URLtoPDF is an easy to use app that allows you to convert any URL / Webpage into a PDF and then have it sent to your inbox instantly. After you receive your converted PDF you can save it directly to your webOS device or email it to anyone you like.  After all, its yours.

To Convert a PDF all you need to do is enter your URL in the textbook and click the "Convert My PDF" button,  read the quick note that pops up then click the "Continue To Next Step" button.  When the email app opens review the URL and if you are satisfied click send and wait 30 sec and check your inbox

To save directly to your webOS device, first open your email and click on the converted PDF.  Next, the PDF will open in the PDF viewer.  In the PDF viewer, swipe down in the top left corner to pull down the menu.  in the menu, click "Save As…", choose the file name, click "Save As" and you are done. 

To retrieve the file put your device in USB mode and you should see the file right in the root of the drive.
